name: Crafter Memory
description:
Mixing a memory game with a craft mechanic.
Your goal is to collect a pickaxe, but it's not as simple as it seems, as you must first collect low-level resources and craft the element before being able to collect them.
There is a tutorial in-game that should let you know how to play.

(There is no winning condition. Just collect a pickaxe and you have it. Or settle to collect one hundred, if you like!)

Made for the Global game jam 2021
